```{python}
data_path = "./data/images/train"
tissue_path = data_path + "/tissue"
cell_path = data_path + "/cell"

tissue_image_names = sorted(os.listdir(tissue_path))
tissue_image_paths = [tissue_path + "/" + image_name for image_name in tissue_image_names]

cell_image_names = sorted(os.listdir(cell_path))
cell_image_paths = [cell_path + "/" + image_name for image_name in cell_image_names]
image_paths = list(zip(tissue_image_paths, cell_image_paths))

image = Image.open(image_paths[0][0]).convert("RGB")
image2 = Image.open(image_paths[0][1]).convert("RGB")
```
